com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client
Interface RhizosphereModel

All Known Subinterfaces:
CustomRhizosphereModel
public interface RhizosphereModel

Marker interface that identifies POJOs to use as Rhizopshere visualization models.

A model represents a single datapoint of the dataset you want to visualize in Rhizosphere. To use custom POJOs as visualization models follow these steps:

  • Mark the POJOs with this interface.
  • Identify all the POJO fields that need to be exposed in Rhizosphere and mark their getters with the RhizosphereModelAttribute annotation. Refer to the annotation documentation for further info.
  • If the annotation based configuration is not enough for the visualization requirements, have the POJOs also implement CustomRhizosphereModel and, if needed, CustomRhizosphereMetaModel
  • Prepare Rhizosphere to receive instances of the configured POJOs via Rhizosphere.prepareFor(RhizosphereMapping).
  • Feed Rhizosphere with POJO instances via Rhizosphere.addModel(Object) and attach the visualization widget to your GWT app.

Rhizosphere internally uses custom tailored JavaScriptObjects to represent visualization models. The information provided by the steps above guide Rhizosphere conversion process from custom POJOs to JavaScriptObjects that can be understood by the underlying Rhizosphere native javascript library.

Author:
battlehorse@google.com (Riccardo Govoni)
